Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Critical
b) Defect Observed: Instrument display flickering. Malfunction reported by flight crew.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Environmental exposure causing accelerated degradation of protective coatings
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Navigation System component.
Inspection revealed damage to critical components.
c) Remedial Measures Update software to latest certified version with bug fixes
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Implement quality control check at manufacturing stage
d) Attributable Code: F - Failure/ageing/Corrosion/Material Failure
Remarks: Thorough investigation completed. Preventive actions recommended.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Investigation findings reviewed. Root cause analysis is acceptable. Recommend implementation of proposed corrective actions.
Date: 05/10/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Eng. K.N. Iyer
